name: Roman Wars: Deck Building Game (Demo)
description:
This is the free demo of ‘Roman Wars: Deck Building Game’ 

The game is still in development (>90% ready)

***

In ‘Roman Wars: Deck Building Game’ we tried to combine elements of a deck-building game with a strategy. Basic rules are simple: you have to build a deck of cards to defeat your enemy but each mission has its gameplay feature or features

This demo contains the full Tutorial and the first mission
The Demo may contain bugs and some features are yet to be implemented
Please give us your comments and suggestions
Enjoy our Demo and have fun!<3
